item.title: The death of web 2.0 innocence?
item.description: Our friend Chris Messina was closer to the death of ma.gnolia than most of us, having worked for them as a consultant, as well as having a close relationship with the site owner. He writes with great insight about how this has affected him personally, as well as the lessons he sees for web 2.0. The thing I don't get about the whole deal is "Why were there no backups?". I've yet to hear any explanations.
